mapper.insert: INSERT INTO host (houstNum, address, cost, capacity, search_On, subject, content) VALUES(#{houseNum}, #{address}, #{cost}, #{capacity}, #{searchOn}, #{subject}, #{content})
INSERT INTO hostHousePic (picNum, saveFileName, hostNum) VALUES(hostHousePic_seq.NEXTVAL, #{saveFileName}, #{hostNum})
INSERT INTO hostHousePic (picNum, species, hostNum) VALUES(hostHousePetInfo_seq.NEXTVAL, #{species}, #{hostNum})
INSERT INTO hostreview(reviewNum, content, hostNum, completeNum) VALUES (hostReview_seq.NEXTVAL, #{content}, #{hostNum}, #{completeNum});
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM hostreview WHERE hostNum=#{hostNum}
